entry.title: Bitcoin pointers
entry.summary: The author of the email, Jonas, is proposing the idea of Canonical Pointers. These pointers are shown in an example given by the author as "btc at 170.1/179-631-520". The author provides a link to a Google Docs document that provides more information regarding this proposal. Additionally, the author mentions a related proposal that was posted last month and provides a link to it. The Bech32 encoded transaction position reference is also mentioned and allows for error detection/correction with just 14 characters. The email ends with a signature attachment that is a PGP-signed message.
